Tracking resources for the 2020 Walbridge(13-4) fire.

Tweet
(Aug, 24) -> Monday evening update

Scanners

These scanners have been most useful in terms of tracking where firefighters have been concentrating their efforts.

- Sonoma CAL FIRE
- All Sonoma County Scanners

Maps

- Location, intensity, wind, and more options
- Aerial traffic. Including tankers, helicopters, tactical, etc. Click on planes to see flight path
- Detailed wind speed and direction
- Air Quality
- Sonoma County Incident Map. Includes evacuation zones

Mt Jackson 2
